actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to authorize negotiation for the accession of Chile to the North American Free Trade Agreement, to provide for Fast Track Consideration and for other purposes.

summary.text: Chile Fast Track Act of 1999 - Authorizes the President to enter into an agreement with Chile that provides for: (1) the accession of Chile to the North American Free Trade Agreement; or (2) the reduction and elimination of tariffs and other nontariff barriers to trade and the eventual establishment of a free trade area between it and the United States. Authorizes the inclusion of trade-related labor and environmental protection standards in any bills submitted to Congress implementing such agreements. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to apply fast-track procedures to implementing bills for agreements entered under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize negotiation for the accession of Chile to the North American Free Trade Agreement, to provide for Fast Track Consideration and for other purposes.
